titleStmt.title: A person that hath travelled abroad in the world hath got the knowledge of a great secret, to cure barrenness, which he hath made use of for many years with very great success, as he can make appear by the testimony of several persons in London, Westminster, and other places thereabouts ...

notesStmt.note: Title taken from first lines of text.
With a royal coat of arms.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
